bio.Bios: Hey, I'm Yoyo from the Alpha Xi class. I'm a second-year Business Administration major, interested in IB, Consulting, and Wealth Management. During my free time, I like to work out, play golf, and read. If you don't know where to find me, I'm probably sitting at a random cafe with a book. Ask me about my boarding school life and my favorite morning routines at recruitment!
